revised_title: Erian (Devonian) Period Floras of North-Eastern America
tldr: The author examines the pre-Carboniferous flora of North-Eastern America, focusing on the Erian (Devonian) period. They describe new species, revise existing classifications, and discuss the conditions and relations of plant growth during this time. The study provides insights into the introduction and extinction of species, as well as the connections between the Erian and Carboniferous floras.
